text: 9.29: Ais 1.9; 13.19; Jer 50.40Kha bigi Aisaia fhum suaŋgi kamen zɨn vugap, hegi. Ana fhum khaŋ suaŋgi, “Maaŋ muuŋgip, Guma Bakɨme, ana guigi guarara ŋkasŋka bakɨme ki. Ana maaŋ muuŋgip nzan gumgi thari tharga fhu, nza za mbatɨgirga. Nza mba Sodom ŋgu bakɨme gu Gomora ŋgu bakɨme, nza mani mbatɨgi farar muuŋgip, nza za mbatɨgirga.”
